cocktails.name: Penicillin
cocktails.description: A Whiskey Sour variation utilizing the amazing smoky qualities of an Islay Whiskey. Sam Ross, Milk & Honey, NYC, 2005
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients (Except Islay Scotch) to shaker, fill completely with ice and shake vigorously. Strain into glass. Float Islay Scotch

cocktails.name: Tommy's Margarita
cocktails.description: Tommy's Margarita, which was created by the legendary Julio Bermejo in the early 90s at his family's San Francisco restaurant Tommy's Mexican.
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to shaker, fill completely with ice and shake vigorously. Strain in to glass.

cocktails.name: Bijou
cocktails.description: Harry Johnson's New & Improved Bartender's Manual, 1882
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to chilled boston glass, add cracked ice and stir for approximately 25-30 seconds, strain into chilled glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.description: A stimulating liquor composed of spirits of any kind, sugar, water and bitters. This sentence, printed in 1806, is the first know report of the word cocktail.
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to mixing glass, add ice and stir 5 or 6 times. Garnish with both a lemon and orange twist.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.description: A combination of whiskey, sweet vermouth, bitters, and a maraschino cherry garnish, this drink embodies the classic, spirit-foward, and aromatic school of cocktails.
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to chilled boston glass, and cracked ice and stir for approximately 25-30 seconds, strain into chilled glass. Garnish with cherry.
